page.title: 12FAMILY LIFE (b)
page.content: She has a fifteen minute break in th e morning and afternoon with a half an hour dinner break in between. The Layton's daughter Amanda has already arrived home and prepared the tea for the rest of the family because she had arrived homed by 4.00pm on the 3.4Opm bus from school.Father then gets home from the colliery at 5.3Opm.After tea Amanda does her homework which usually takes about two hours. Her intention is to go to college. Mr. and Mrs. Layton sit and watch television for a while.Mrs. Layton then does some housework and Mr.Layton goes into the garden to tend his vegetable plot and his greenhouse.He specialises in chrysanthamums and carnations. At about 8.OOpm the family has some supper. Amanda and Mrs. Layton then watch television for about an hour.
